title: Best of The Herd: 02/20/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 02/20/2019
description:
Colin says the Packers need to just go get Antonio Brown right now.  He says the best negotiating strategy the Cowboys can use with Dak Prescott is patience.  Plus, Actor/Producer Michael Rapaport comes in studio to yell at Colin about his constant Russell Westbrook criticism.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
